channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Deep pothole in addition to those already reported but not fixed, 23rd December
item.description:
See image. Four potholes on this stretch of road now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light not working, 22nd December
item.description:
Corner of alley between Lee Close and Marchant Close
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Marchant Close, Kingsditch, Cheltenham

item.title: Fly tipping of items in trees/bushes by the railway over bridge on Pirton Lane, 22nd December
item.description:
There are a small number of items that have been fly tipped over the wall at the start of the Pirton Lane railway over bridge (the Sugarloaf View on Pirton Lane side of the bridge).

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pirton Lane, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain, 22nd December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Horsefair Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Multiple potholes along one stretch of road, deep enough to damage tyres. You have to drive like youâ€™re drunk to avoid them all, 22nd December
item.description:
They start outside Hayden Road Allotments and continue until the junction for Pilgrove Way
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Hayden Road, Hesters Way, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Massive Pothole, 22nd December
item.description:
Between Badgeworth and Shurdington, just as you go round the bend. On the left side of the road but near the middle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Badgeworth Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
